item.description:
For those coming to Portland for the weekend or even just Saturday:
Watch the Rugby World Cup semi-finals in style @ Rivalries Sports Pub, Portland, Maine.
Rivalries Sports Pub and Grill
Aside from screening RWC 2007, Rivalries screens NFL, basketball, baseball etc. etc. so there's something for every sports fan @ this pub.

The RWC game starts @ 3pm, and like all sports players we'll need to warm up beforehand, hence the 2pm start... :)
Typically a rugby game runs 40 minutes each way/half, with approx. 10 minutes between the 2 halves of the game, so the game should be over before 5pm.
item.name: Rugby World Cup 2007 - Semi Final 1
